The '''Dominican Republic men's national under-15, under-16 and under-17 basketball team' is a national basketball team of the Dominican Republic, administered by the Federaci√≥n Dominicana de Baloncesto. It represents the country in international under-15, under-16 and under-17 basketball competitions.
